type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Mob Origins](https://moborigins.ultrusmods.me/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Damage Equipment

---

Damages an entity's equipment at a specified slot by a specified amount.

---

### Example
```json
{
  "type": "apoli:action_over_time",
  "entity_action": {
    "type": "moborigins:damage_equipment",
    "equipment_slot": "head",
    "amount": 1
  },
  "interval": 40,
  "condition": {
    "type": "apoli:exposed_to_sun"
  }
}
```
Damages the entity's helmet slot item by 1 every 2 seconds while they are exposed to the sun.
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Mob Origins](https://moborigins.ultrusmods.me/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Damage Equipment

---

Damages an entity's equipment at a specified slot by a specified amount.

---

### Example
```json
{
  "type": "apoli:action_over_time",
  "entity_action": {
    "type": "moborigins:damage_equipment",
    "equipment_slot": "head",
    "amount": 1
  },
  "interval": 40,
  "condition": {
    "type": "apoli:exposed_to_sun"
  }
}
```
Damages the entity's helmet slot item by 1 every 2 seconds while they are exposed to the sun.

equipment_slot.description: The equipment slot to damage, options are: `"mainhand"`, `"offhand"`, `"head"`, `"chest"`, `"legs"`, `"feet"`
equipment_slot.markdownDescription: The equipment slot to damage, options are: `"mainhand"`, `"offhand"`, `"head"`, `"chest"`, `"legs"`, `"feet"`

amount.description: The amount of damage to deal to the equipment.
amount.markdownDescription: The amount of damage to deal to the equipment.

x-intellij-html-description:
Damage Equipment

Damages an entity's equipment at a specified slot by a specified amount.

Fields

Field Type Default Description
equipment_slot EquipmentSlot The equipment slot to damage, options are: "mainhand", "offhand", "head", "chest", "legs", "feet"
amount Integer The amount of damage to deal to the equipment.

Example

{
  "type": "apoli:action_over_time",
  "entity_action": {
    "type": "moborigins:damage_equipment",
    "equipment_slot": "head",
    "amount": 1
  },
  "interval": 40,
  "condition": {
    "type": "apoli:exposed_to_sun"
  }
}

Damages the entity's helmet slot item by 1 every 2 seconds while they are exposed to the sun.
